summary: WHEN BRAKES ARE APPLIED AND VEHICLE BODY SHIFTS BACK TO REST A SECOND BUMP CAN BE FELT UNDERNEATH THE VEHICLE LIKE SOMETHING IS LOOSE OR THE TRANSMISSION SHIFTS DOWN LATE   -OR-    WHEN THE TRANSMISSION HAS SHIFTED DOWN FROM 3RD GEAR, LIKE FROM 45 MPH OR SO TO 0 MPH, AND STOPPED FOR MORE THAN SAY 5 SECONDS, WHEN THE BRAKE PEDEL IS RELEASED A BUMP CAN BE FELT LIKE THE TRANSMISSION IS SHIFTING INTO 1ST VERY LATE. IT FEELS LIKE A VEHICLE  TAPPED YOU FROM BEHIND.
